title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2050.7 - Conduct of sample survey of Cities of Albany and Watervliet, Albany County, and City of Rensselaer, Rensselaer County
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2050.7 - Conduct of sample survey of Cities of Albany and Watervliet, Albany County, and City of Rensselaer, Rensselaer County

State Regulations

All persons who own, operate, manage, occupy or dwell in
any structure, or part thereof, subject to the Emergency Housing Rent Control

Law, as individuals or in any other capacity, shall give access to, assist and
cooperate with any and all representatives of the Division of Housing and

Community Renewal, Office of Rent Administration, in the conduct of any survey, study, investigation or inspection with relation to such structure, or part
thereof, upon the presentation of duly authenticated credentials issued by the
division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2050.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
